The Prophet ﷺ said: Successful is he who is endowed with understanding, successful is he who is endowed with understanding. He said: O Messenger of Allah, give me two of your garments that you have worn. So he gave him. When at the standing place of Arafat, the Messenger of Allah ﷺ said: Repeat what you said. So he repeated. The Messenger of Allah ﷺ said: Successful is he who is endowed with understanding, successful is he who is endowed with understanding.
